issue.title: [R] In the R tutorial it refers to 2010 03 data which doesn't exists
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9578](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9578). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I get a 404 error when trying to download the 2010 03 NYC taxi data.

 

https://ursa-labs-taxi-data.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/2010/03/data.parquet
